from com.virtusa.akura.api.dto.SubjectTeacher teacher
where((? = '' OR teacher.staff.lastName like ?) and (? = '' OR teacher.staff.registrationNo = ?)) Group By teacher.staff.staffId, teacher.gradeSubject.gradeSubjectId, teacher.year

from com.virtusa.akura.api.dto.SubjectTeacher teacher
where( teacher.staff.staffId = ? and teacher.gradeSubject.gradeSubjectId = ? and teacher.year = ?)

select teacher.schoolClass.classId from com.virtusa.akura.api.dto.SubjectTeacher teacher
where( teacher.staff.staffId = ? and teacher.gradeSubject.gradeSubjectId = ? and teacher.year = ?)

select teacher.schoolClass from com.virtusa.akura.api.dto.SubjectTeacher teacher
where( teacher.staff.staffId = ? and teacher.gradeSubject.gradeSubjectId = ? and teacher.year = ?)

from com.virtusa.akura.api.dto.SubjectTeacher teacher
where( teacher.staff = ? and teacher.gradeSubject = ? and teacher.schoolClass = ?)
from com.virtusa.akura.api.dto.SubjectTeacher subTeacher where( subTeacher.schoolClass = ? and subTeacher.gradeSubject.grade = ? and subTeacher.year = ? )
select distinct teacher.gradeSubject.subject.description from com.virtusa.akura.api.dto.SubjectTeacher teacher where (teacher.staff.staffId = ? and teacher.year = ?)
update com.virtusa.akura.api.dto.SubjectTeacher subTeacher set subTeacher.deleted = 1 where( subTeacher.staff.staffId = ? )
update com.virtusa.akura.api.dto.SubjectTeacher subTeacher set subTeacher.deleted = 0 where( subTeacher.staff.staffId = ? )
delete com.virtusa.akura.api.dto.SubjectTeacher subTeacher Where (subTeacher.staff.staffId = ? AND STR_TO_DATE(subTeacher.year, '%Y-%b-%d') > ?)
